name: minecraft
description: These configuration files were meant for a pi server running on a Raspberry Pi 4 4GB.

scripts.build-sellout: cd sellout_src && mvn clean compile assembly:single && cd .. && cp sellout_src/target/SelloutPlugin-* plugins/
scripts.build-repeller: cd repeller_src && mvn clean compile assembly:single && cd .. && cp repeller_src/target/RepellerPlugin-* plugins/
scripts.start:watch: nodemon -e java,yml --watch repeller_src/src --exec npm run build-repeller
